Plot: A grieving widower is drawn into a custody battle over his granddaughter, whom he helped raise her entire life.
Title: Black or White
Actors: Kevin Costner, Octavia Spencer, Jillian Estell, Bill Burr
tomatoConsensus: Black or White has more on its mind than your average family drama, but the film's approach to its thought-provoking themes too often lives down to its title.
